page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: 3 Churches in Cotherstone encompassing 3 religions {Church of England:} Parish of Romaldkirk with Cotherstone and Laithkirk. St Cuthbert's Church erected 1881; heated by radiators from oil-fired boiler. Sunday attendance, 12-30 people. Set form of service conducted by Rev Roy Boff. {Methodist Church:} erected 1872 Heated by gas central heating; Sunday attendance 10-27 people. Sunday school 5-15 people. Friday Youth Club - over 11s. No set form of service - lay- preachers take many services. Minister Rev Margaret Stanworth {Quakers (Religious Society of Friends) Friends' Meeting House erected 1796. Heat & light by calor gas; no electri- city or water. Sunday attendance 5-20 people who travel up to 15 miles. No set service. Elders & Overseers.
